description: The pilot makes an entry call to the tower, reporting their position and altitude.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Crossing Z-2
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, we are crossing Z-2 maintaining 1500ft.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report field in sight
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, maintain 1500ft, report field in sight Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report field in sight
calls.message: Maintain 1500ft, will report field in sight Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot initiates a PFL overhead procedure with a radio check.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Radio Check
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, radio check.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Loud and clear, report field in sight
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, loud and clear. Maintain 2000 feet, report field in sight Runway 16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report field in sight
calls.message: Maintain 2000 feet, will report field in sight Runway 16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot makes an entry call for an initial pitch out.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request initial pitch out
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, over Z-2 at 1500 feet for initial pitch out.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Maintain altitude, report field in sight
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, maintain 1500 feet, report field in sight.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report field in sight
calls.message: Will report field in sight, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot makes an entry call for a VOR-Y approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request VOR-Y approach
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, maintaining 3000 feet for VOR-Y approach.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Maintain altitude, report B-1
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, maintain 3000 feet, report B-1.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report B-1
calls.message: Maintain 3000 feet, will report B-1, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot is released from Dhaka Control and requests descent for a VOR-Z approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request descent for VOR-Z
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, released by Dhaka Control, ready for descent.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Descend, report 12 DME Arc
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, descend to 3000 feet, QNH 1013, report established 12 DME Arc Runway 16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm descend and report
calls.message: Descend to 3000 feet, QNH 1013, will report established 12 DME Arc Runway 16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot is released from Dhaka Control and requests descent for an RNP approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request descent for RNP
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, released by Dhaka Control, ready for descent.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Descend, report over JERIN
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, descend to 3000 feet, QNH 1013, report over JERIN.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm descend and report
calls.message: Descend to 3000 feet, QNH 1013, will report over JERIN, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports that the airfield is in sight.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Field in sight
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, field in sight Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report initial
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report initial Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report initial
calls.message: Will report initial Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports the beginning of the initial approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Initial
calls.message: {Call Sign}, initial Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report end of initial
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report end of initial Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report end of initial
calls.message: Will report end of initial Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports the end of the initial approach and receives descent instructions.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: End of initial
calls.message: {JSR TWR} {Call Sign}, end of initial.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Descend to 1000ft
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, descent to 1000ft join beginning of downwind.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm descend to 1000ft
calls.message: Descending to 1000ft, will join beginning of downwind, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports the field is in sight for the PFL procedure.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Field in sight
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, field in sight Runway 16.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report crossing undershoot
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report crossing undershoot Runway 16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report undershoot
calls.message: Will report crossing undershoot Runway 16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports crossing the undershoot and receives further instructions.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Crossing undershoot
calls.message: {Call Sign}, crossing undershoot Runway 16.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report approaching high key
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, maintain 2000 feet, report approaching high key.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report high key
calls.message: Maintain 2000 feet, will report approaching high key, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports approaching the high key position.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Approaching high key
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, approaching high key.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report high key
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report high key.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report high key
calls.message: Will report high key, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports at the high key position.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: High key
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, high key.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report low key
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report low key.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report low key
calls.message: Will report low key, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports at the low key position.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Low key
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, low key.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report base key
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report base key.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report base key
calls.message: Will report base key, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports at the base key position.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Base key
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, base key.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Check gears, report final
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, surface wind 320 at 05 knots, check gears down and locked, report final Runway 16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report final
calls.message: Wind copied, check gears, will report final Runway 16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on final for a full stop landing during a PFL.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Final for full stop
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, final, three green, for full stop.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared to land
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, recheck gears down and locked, surface wind 320 at 05 knots, cleared to land Runway 16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm cleared to land
calls.message: Cleared to land Runway 16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports established on the 12 DME Arc.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Established 12 DME Arc
calls.message: {Call Sign}, established 12 DME Arc.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared for approach, report radial
calls.message: {Call Sign}, cleared for the approach. Descend to 1700 feet, report crossing radial 300.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm cleared for approach
calls.message: Cleared for the approach, descending to 1700 feet, will report crossing radial 300, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports crossing the specified radial.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Crossing radial 300
calls.message: {Call Sign}, crossing radial 300.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report turning inbound
calls.message: {Call Sign}, report turning inbound Runway 16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report turning inbound
calls.message: Will report turning inbound Runway 16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports turning inbound and receives descent instructions.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Turning inbound
calls.message: {Call Sign}, turning inbound.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Descend to minima
calls.message: {Call Sign}, descend to minima, report runway in sight.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm descend to minima
calls.message: Descending to minima, will report runway in sight, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports the runway in sight and receives landing clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Runway in sight
calls.message: {Call Sign}, runway in sight.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared to land
calls.message: {Call Sign}, check gears down and locked, wind calm, Runway 16, cleared to land.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm cleared to land
calls.message: Cleared to land Runway 16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports over the JERIN waypoint.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Over JERIN
calls.message: {Call Sign}, over JERIN.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared for approach, report JR161
calls.message: {Call Sign}, cleared for the approach. Descend to 1700 feet, report over JR161.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm cleared for approach
calls.message: Cleared for the approach, descending to 1700 feet, will report over JR161, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports over the JR161 waypoint.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Over JR161
calls.message: {Call Sign}, over JR161.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report over JR160
calls.message: {Call Sign}, report over JR160.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report over JR160
calls.message: Will report over JR160, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports over the JR160 waypoint and receives landing clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Over JR160
calls.message: {Call Sign}, over JR160.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared to land
calls.message: {Call Sign}, check gears down and locked, wind calm, Runway 16, cleared to land.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm cleared to land
calls.message: Cleared to land Runway 16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot, operating 5 miles west, requests to rejoin the circuit for landing.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request to join circuit
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, operating 5 miles west, request to join the circuit for landing.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report downwind
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report downwind Runway 16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report downwind
calls.message: Will report downwind Runway 16, {Call Sign}.

description: After landing, the pilot requests dispersal and receives taxi instructions.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request dispersal
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, request dispersal.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Air taxi, contact ground
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, air taxi via Quebec, contact ground when clear.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm air taxi
calls.message: Air taxi via Quebec, will contact ground when clear, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot contacts ground for taxi instructions to the helipad.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Contacting Ground
calls.message: {JSR GRD}, {Call Sign}, with you.

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Air taxi to helipad
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR GRD}, air taxi via Quebec to the helipad.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm air taxi to helipad
calls.message: Air taxi via Quebec to the helipad, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports over the B-1 fix during a VOR-Y approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Report B-1 fix
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, B-1, 3000 feet.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Maintain altitude, report B-2
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, maintain 3000 feet, report B-2.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report B-2
calls.message: Maintain 3000 feet, will report B-2, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports over the B-2 fix and approaching the outbound leg.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Report B-2 fix
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, B-2, 3000 feet, approaching outbound.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report 6 miles out
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report 6 miles out.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report 6 miles out
calls.message: Will report 6 miles out, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports 6 miles out and receives approach clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Report 6 miles out
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, 6 miles out.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared for approach, descend
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, cleared for the approach. Descend to 1700 feet, report turning inbound.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm cleared for approach
calls.message: Cleared for the approach, descending to 1700 feet, will report turning inbound, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports turning inbound on the VOR-Y approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Turning inbound
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, turning inbound, 1700 feet.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report steady inbound
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report steady inbound.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report steady inbound
calls.message: Will report steady inbound, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports steady on the inbound course.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Steady inbound
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, steady inbound.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Descend to minima, report runway
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, descend to minima, report runway in sight.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm descend to minima
calls.message: Descending to minima, will report runway in sight, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports the runway in sight and receives clearance for a low go.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Runway in sight
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, runway in sight.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared for low go
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, check gears down and locked, surface wind 180 at 05 knots, cleared for low go Runway 16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm cleared for low go
calls.message: Wind copied, cleared for low go Runway 16, {Call Sign}.

description: After landing, the tower provides taxi instructions to the pilot.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Taxi to ground
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, taxi via Oscar after vacating contact ground 121.8.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm taxi to ground
calls.message: Taxi via Oscar, after vacating contact ground 121.8, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot contacts ground control after landing for taxi instructions to the tarmac.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Contacting Ground
calls.message: {JSR GRD}, {Call Sign}, with you.

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Taxi to tarmac
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR GRD}, taxi via Oscar-Papa-Alpha to tarmac.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm taxi to tarmac
calls.message: Taxi via Oscar-Papa-Alpha to tarmac, {Call Sign}.

description: After landing, the tower provides taxi instructions to a specific bay.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Taxi to Bay 04
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, landed at {time 52}, taxi via Romeo-Papa-Lima to Bay 04.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm taxi to bay
calls.message: Taxi via Romeo-Papa-Lima to Bay 04, {Call Sign}.
